item.title: MIUI V13.0.1.0.SKTRUXM Recovery update for Redmi Note 11 Pro+ 5G Russia
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi Note 11 Pro+ 5G Russia

Codename: pissarro

Version: V13.0.1.0.SKTRUXM | 12.0

Size: 3.3 GB

MD5: 66f440dc6da028b2609b7072159ad2d9

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to May 2022. Increased system security.
Stable MIUI based on Android 12
[More features and improvements]
New: Apps can be opened as floating windows directly from the sidebar
Optimization: Enhanced accessibility support for Phone, Clock, and Weather
Optimization: Mind map nodes are more convenient and intuitive now

Download: Here
